Scritpics | Data Strategy
  1. service
    • Development & Maintenance
    • Accelerate
    • Insight
    • Experience
  2. Accelerate
    • Sales Force
    • Cloud Digital Transfomation
  3. Cloud Digital Transfomation

Advanced Analytics
Solutions Framework Industries

Our Solutions

Analytics-as-a-service

Create user-centered data science solutions for product owners, business analysts, and sales. Set up complex predictive data modeling to enable superior decision-making. Using a customized technological stack, transform and manage data science projects effortlessly.

Modelops

Govern and manage the whole life cycle of AI models by leveraging DevOps and ML principles to operationalize data pipelines at scale. Orchestrate continuous model training using ML pipelines and CI/CD system automation to make constructing, testing, and deploying new data pipelines easier.

Computer Vision

Create vision-based augmented and automated solutions such as face recognition, image categorization, object identification, gesture recognition, annotation, and labelling. Get recommendations for running deep learning-based analysis to detect visual anomalies in photos.

Text Analytics (NLP)

Integrate Scriptics' text analytics engine to implement natural language processing (NLP) and expand data platforms, applications, or products. Create business insights from text compilations, gain a deeper understanding of client preferences through sentiment analysis, and maximise the value of knowledge management assets.

Conversational AI

Using cognitive conversational skills, drive smooth engagements with a human touch. Across agent helpdesks, corporate service bots, and consumer self-service bots, automate text and voice-based exchanges. Improve the consumer experience by investigating the data's potential for broader reach.

Our Framework

Industries

Financial Industries

48 prestigious financial services companies have put their trust in Scriptics to manage a cloud-led, agile-first digital transformation. Utilizing strategic roadmaps for infrastructure modernization and security, they have reduced overall expenditures by 50% while achieving over 60% better time-to-delivery.

Banking & Insurance

In order to close their data centers ahead of schedule, Scriptics has provided native cloud solutions and cloud migration services to 28 international banks and insurance companies. Scriptics's advanced analytics models, SecOps, cloud banking solutions, and modernization plans enable them to save 70% of their time while saving 60% of their money.

Media & Entertainment

22 M&E firms around the world have delegated Scriptics to modernize and scale out their media platforms so that millions of consumers can access them easily. They've secured their applications with agility and deployed them on the public cloud to meet regulatory obligations while saving money.

Telecom

The analytics, modernisation, and ML/AI solutions provided by Scriptics have simplified the digitization and modernization projects of ten telecom players. It has enabled them to establish fully automated workflows, increase user involvement by more than 50%, and speed insights delivery while maintaining 99% process correctness.

Technology

Scriptics has vast experience providing cloud migration, managed services, advanced analytics, and business insight to 75 technology firms. This not only increased their business performance by more than 60% on average, but also enabled on-demand scalability with over 30% cost savings.
